00015 // Function: GenericEditProvider()
00016 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00017 GenericEditProvider::GenericEditProvider(unsigned int historySize) : historySize_(historySize),
00018                                                                      undoStack_(), redoStack_(),
00019                                                                      undoing_(false), redoing_(false)
00020 {
00021 }
00022

00030 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00031 // Function: addAction()
00032 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00033 void GenericEditProvider::addCommand(QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand> command, bool autoExec)
00034 {
00035     Q_ASSERT(undoStack_.size() <= historySize_);
00036 
00037     if (!undoing_ || !redoing_)
00038     {
00039         // Erase the redo stack.
00040         redoStack_.clear();
00041 
00042         // Add the action to the undo stack.
00043         undoStack_.append(command);
00044 
00045         // Execute the command if requested.
00046         if (autoExec)
00047         {
00048             command->redo();
00049         }
00050 
00051         // Check if the undo stack is too large and in that chase, remove the oldest undo command.
00052         if (undoStack_.size() > historySize_)
00053         {
00054             undoStack_.removeFirst();
00055         }
00056 
00057         // Inform others.
00058         emit editStateChanged();
00059     }
00060 
00061     Q_ASSERT(undoStack_.size() <= historySize_);
00062 }
00063 
00064 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00065 // Function: undo()
00066 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00067 void GenericEditProvider::undo()
00068 {
00069     // Check if we cannot undo.
00070     if (!canUndo())
00071     {
00072         return;
00073     }
00074 
00075     undoing_ = true;
00076 
00077     // Pop and undo the topmost command in the undo stack.
00078     QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand> command = undoStack_.last();
00079     undoStack_.removeLast();
00080 
00081     command->undo();
00082 
00083     // Push the command to the redo stack.
00084     redoStack_.push(command);
00085 
00086     undoing_ = false;
00087     emit editStateChanged();
00088 }
00089 
00090 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00091 // Function: redo()
00092 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00093 void GenericEditProvider::redo()
00094 {
00095     // Check if we cannot redo.
00096     if (!canRedo())
00097     {
00098         return;
00099     }
00100 
00101     redoing_ = true;
00102 
00103     // Pop and redo the topmost command in the redo stack.
00104     QSharedPointer<QUndoCommand> command = redoStack_.pop();
00105     command->redo();
00106 
00107     // Push the command to the undo stack.
00108     undoStack_.append(command);
00109 
00110     redoing_ = false;
00111     emit editStateChanged();
00112 }
00113 
00114 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00115 // Function: canUndo()
00116 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00117 bool GenericEditProvider::canUndo() const
00118 {
00119     return !undoStack_.empty();
00120 }
00121 
00122 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00123 // Function: canUndo()
00124 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00125 bool GenericEditProvider::canRedo() const
00126 {
00127     return !redoStack_.empty();
00128 }
00129 
00130 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00131 // Function: isPerformingUndoRedo()
00132 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00133 bool GenericEditProvider::isPerformingUndoRedo() const
00134 {
00135     return (undoing_ || redoing_);
00136 }
00137 
00138 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00139 // Function: clear()
00140 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00141 void GenericEditProvider::clear()
00142 {
00143     undoStack_.clear();
00144     redoStack_.clear();
00145     emit editStateChanged();
00146 }
